author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-1326 (partial) Network server may abandon sessions when Derby
system is shutdown and this causes intermittent hangs in the client
Don't poison the network server's worker threads when an engine
shutdown is detected. Poisoning the threads could lead to abandoning
of sessions and hangs in the client.

author: epunzalan
msg: fixed bug in redirection which requests another release operation when the page refreshes.
added loading of release plugin parameters from within the project's pom
